page.title: 18A BORDON PUPIL 2.
page.content: The day started at 8.30 a.m. and we went to the tutor and had our mark put in the register. After tutor we went to Block 2 for T.D. with Mr.Cross. Next was Games and we played baseball. The teacher was Mr. Withers. At break everyone goes to the main hall where the canteen is. The next period was Maths.In Maths we have Mr Alexander. We are working on a new scheme with some small Schools Maths Project books. At dinner time everyone gets locked out of school because of the strike action.When we get back to school we have to get our marks in the school register again. After that we have library where you read and after that we have music with Mrs Mercier. After that the bell goes for home-time.
